raw akas.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block

akas: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (original title)
akas from release info: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (original title)

1.title: All Aboard

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: In the second-season opener, fans set sail for Grand Turk Island with the band, and five groups of passengers share the dreams they hope will come true on this cruise.

2.title: 80s Prom

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Joey and a fan bond over missing their proms during a 1980s theme night; an attempt is made to lure Donnie to a cabin; and a comedian tries to bypass security and invite the New Kids on the Block to her comedy show.

3.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The guys feel exhausted prior to their big cruise concert, so rehearsal is a struggle; a fan gets nervous before spending some one-on-one time with Jordan; a woman plots to get her neck brace signed by Joey.

4.title: Donnie Loves Augie

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Jenny McCarthy's radio show is broadcast from the boat; Donnie bonds too much with a male fan; a singing rehearsal with Joey doesn't go well for a fan; the New Kids on the Block host a toga party.

5.title: Island Escapades

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The boat docks at Grand Turk and a pool party gets underway; Joey goes surfing; Jordan rides ATVs; Jon goes go zip-lining with a fan who's not fond of heights.

6.title: Less Clothes, More Fun

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: TV Night gets wild when Donnie and Joey strip off their costumes; Danny pays tribute to his mom; tension builds between two fans who are sisters.

7.title: Selfie King

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Donnie tries to break a world record for selfies; fans eagerly seek Jordan's attendance at a party; a woman threatens to skip her sister's performance with Joey.

8.title: The Queen of Comedy

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: It's the day of Libby's comedy show and she's a wreck wondering if Joey Mac will make it. Meanwhile, Melissa gets a surprise encounter with a New Kid but breaks down when her friends aren't there to share it.

9.title: Surprise at Sea

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Melissa's surprise party is finally here, but her friends still don't know whether Jordan will jump out of her cake. Augie enlists Johnny's help to get Jess a special moment with Donnie, hoping to make this 5th anniversary a night she will never forget.

10.title: Rock 'til We Dock

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: It's the final night on the cruise and the New Kids prepare to go out with a bang. Meanwhile, Beth tries to get one-on-one time with Donnie, Jess finally enjoys VIP treatment, and Melissa gets the surprise of her life.

1.title: Bon Voyage

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Three thousand fans embark on a life-changing cruise to Bermuda with New Kids on the Block. Meet eight groups of passengers - all with unique reasons for coming on board and all with dreams of getting close to the band.

2.title: The Masquerade Ball

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Almost everyone's partying at the Masquerade Ball, except for Katie and Jackie, who are devising a plan to sneak into Donnie Wahlberg's VIP after party, and bride-to-be Dannyelle, who is busy putting out the fires of her incompetent bridesmaids.

3.title: Dreams and Schemes

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Bride-to-be Dannyelle turns totally Bridezilla, making insane wedding demands that horrify her bridesmaids. Meanwhile, the Seattle Super Fans plot to dress as room service waiters and sneak into the New Kids' cabins for one-on-one time with the guys.

4.title: Lights! Camera! New Kids!

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: It's the cruise photo op where each girl gets a chance to pose with her favorite New Kid, but taking the picture of their dreams turns out to be a nightmare for the Bikini Sisters. And when Wild Child Amanda tries to get closer to Donnie, she makes the worst mistake of her life.

5.title: The New Kids: LIVE!

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Expectations are high for the New Kids concert tonight, where Single Mom Maria gets the thrill of a lifetime but Amanda misses out because she is too humiliated to leave her room after offending Danny Wood.

6.title: Cowboys and Blockheads

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: It's the wildest night yet on the New Kids' cruise at the Cowboy-Up party, where Katie and Jackie make a splash that grabs Donnie Wahlberg's attention. Meanwhile, the Single Moms go wild and Seattle Super Fan Sarah dances with a very special someone.

7.title: Blockheads in Bermuda

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Cruisers dock in Bermuda expecting a day in paradise, but the Bikini Sisters meet their nemesis; the Single Moms take dangerous risks; and the Seattle Super Fans miss their ride back to the boat. Meanwhile, on the ship, Amanda gets the surprise of her life.

8.title: Wedding Bells

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Bride Dannyelle's big day is finally here, but there's still no word on whether the New Kids will come to her wedding. Meanwhile, Amanda finally gets the band encounter she�s hoped for.

9.title: No Sleep 'Til New York

episode of.title: Rock This Boat: New Kids on the Block (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: As the cruise comes to an end, the ladies prepare to say goodbye to four days of magic with NKOTB. Meanwhile, the Seattle Super Fans get to live out a fantasy beyond their wildest dreams.

imdb.plot outline: Die-hard fans take the vacation of a lifetime when they board a cruise with the sole intention of being near the members of their favorite band for just a few days. New Kids on the Block (NKOTB), one of the hottest boy bands in music history with more than 80 million albums sold worldwide, will set sail on the wildly popular, sold out cruise with their most loyal fans for a four-day adventure at sea. The cast includes a whole range of NKOTB devotees from three sisters taking the family cruise they've always dreamt about to a group of single moms looking to let their hair down by partying with rock stars. Sail on back to your youth with Rock This Boat - celebrating fandom like never before.
